summary: A pure‑Python WebRTC stack that implements the full signaling and media pipeline: SDP parsing, ICE candidate gathering, DTLS handshake, SRTP/SCTP transport, RTP/RTCP packet handling, jitter buffering, bitrate estimation, media track abstraction, and statistics collection, enabling real‑time audio, video, and data channel communication.
business_intent: Provide developers with a ready‑to‑use library for building, testing, or deploying real‑time communication applications (e.g., voice/video calls, live streaming, collaborative tools) in Python without relying on native WebRTC binaries.
